mapper.select: SELECT hh.hardware_name,hh.hardware_id,ha.attribute_name,hav.attribute_val,hav.attribute_val_id, hhav.attribute_val_type,ha.attribute_code FROM h_hardware hh left join h_hardware_attribute_val hhav on hh.hardware_id = hhav.hardware_id left join h_attribute ha on hhav.attribute_id = ha.attribute_id left join h_attribute_val hav on hhav.attribute_val_id = hav.attribute_val_id where hh.items_id=#{items_branch}

SELECT hh.hardware_name,hh.hardware_id,ha.attribute_name,hav.attribute_val,hav.attribute_val_id, hhav.attribute_val_type,ha.attribute_code FROM h_hardware hh left join h_hardware_attribute_val hhav on hh.hardware_id = hhav.hardware_id left join h_attribute ha on hhav.attribute_id = ha.attribute_id left join h_attribute_val hav on hhav.attribute_val_id = hav.attribute_val_id where 1=1
and hh.items_id=#{items_id}
and hh.hardware_id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{hardware_id}),'%')
and hh.hardware_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{hardware_name}),'%')
